about_the_policy: The policy protects in case of accident
sum_insured_rs: On the basis of the monthly income from gainful employment, Minimum - Rs 1 Lac, Maximum Rs 7 Crore

table_b.permanent_partial_disablement: Specified percentage depending on the disability

table_c.permanent_partial_disablement: Specified percentage depending on the disability
table_c.temporary_total_disablement: Rate of 1% of the sum insured, subject to a maximum of Rs.15,000/-, per completed week, upto 100 weeks

no_claim_bonus: 5% for claim free year, maximum accumulation 50%

additional_benefit_no_extra_premium.educational_grant_to_children: 1 child: Rs.10,000/-, 2 or more children: Rs. 20,000/-
additional_benefit_no_extra_premium.travel_expenses_of_one_relative: Upto 1% of Total sum insured or maximum Rs 50,000
additional_benefit_no_extra_premium.vehicle_and_or_residence_modification: Upto 10% of sum of Table B and Table C, maximum of Rs. 50,000/-
additional_benefit_no_extra_premium.purchase_of_blood: Upto 5% of the sum insured under relevant table, maximum of Rs. 10,000/-
additional_benefit_no_extra_premium.transportation_of_imported_medicines: Upto 5% of Total sum insured, maximum of Rs 20,000

optional_benefits_on_payment_of_addition.medical_expenses_extension: 25% of the valid claim or 10% of the sum insured or actuals whichever is less, subject to an overall limit of Rs.5,00,000/- per policy period
optional_benefits_on_payment_of_addition.coverage_for_winter_sports: Can be granted for the period the Insured person proposes to participate in such sports
optional_benefits_on_payment_of_addition.hospital_cash: Cash Benefit of Rs 1000/- for each completed day, Hospitalization happens within 30 days from the date of accident. 15 days per hospitalization & 60 days per policy period
optional_benefits_on_payment_of_addition.home_convalescence: Rs 500/- for each completed day subject to a maximum of 15 days per occurrence and 60 days per policy period towards the cost of engaging one attendant at residence immediately after discharge from the hospital & recommended by the attending physician

premium_differs_based_on_risk_group: Risk Group I, Risk Group II, Risk Group III
family_discount: 10% discount on total premium if family is covered
